item.title: 2015 05 14_loremipsum
item.description: #Title Hello this is Simple and clean design Responsive design Pagination Tagging Disqus Source code highlighting Google Analytics Screenshot All of the display here. Installation Installation2 Clone this repository to your hugo theme directory. cd themes git clone https://github.com/tanksuzuki/angels-ladder hugo server -t angels-ladder -D -w Configuration To take full advantage of the features in this theme, you can add variables to your site config file. The following is the example configuration.
